title: Smoothie & Sweetie
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Raw, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: A vegetarian juice bar/coffee shop/bakery and organic shop specializes in vegan raw foods. Made-in-house cookies, energy bars, veggie chips and crackers are dehydrated at low temperatures, (not baked or fried). Fresh made-in-house vegan raw cakes and vegan cheeses are also available. The juice and smoothie bar serves green, detox, slimming and others on a large menu.
